commentary.text: Robin Uthappa, the man in form, to take strike against an in-form Bhuvneshwar Kumar
Kumar to Uthappa,1 run,starts off with a short of length outswinger, Uthappa dabs it to gully for a quick single
One slip and a gully in place, one leg slip too
Kumar to Gambhir,no run,he walks down the pitch to the back of length delivery, defends it to point
Kumar to Gambhir,no run,this one swings away and flies past the outside edge as Gambhir attempts his trademark poke to third man
Kumar to Gambhir,no run,he steps out of the crease and wants to smack it over the infield, but this one swings away again and beats the outside edge
Leg slip moves to square leg
Kumar to Gambhir, $$FOUR$$ ,this one comes in to him but Gambhir gets on top of that and despite there not being much room, he smashes it behind point for a boundary
Gambhir stops Bhuvi in his run-up as there is some movement around the sight-screen
Kumar to Gambhir,1 run,this one comes in from a length, Gambhir nudges it to square leg for a quick single
Dale Steyn to start from the other end. one slip and a leg gully
Steyn to Gambhir,no run,he comes forward and crunches this length delivery to cover, he timed it beautifully, but straight to the fielder
Steyn to Gambhir,1 run,back of length on the body, Gambhir hops on his toes and nudges it behind square on the leg side for another quick single
Steyn to Uthappa,1 run,this one could have been risky but Gambhir makes it to the other end in time. Robin pushed it softly to the left of Warner at point
Steyn to Gambhir,no run,not much swing for Steyn. This one is on the off stump, Gambhir dabs it to cover off the back foot
Steyn to Gambhir,no run,length delivery on off, punched back to the bowler

Steyn to Gambhir, $$OUT$$ ,big appeal! Gambhir swings at this length delivery, this was angled across. He wanted to whack it over cover, but there doesn't seem to be any edge. Gambhir is upset, very very upset. He is still mouthing stuff even after getting back in the dug out, the ball swung away after it passed the bat, maybe that influenced the umpire
Kumar to Uthappa,no run,back of a length ball guided to point, non-striker wants the single, there isn't any
Kumar to Uthappa,no run,jags in sharply and hits him on the thigh pad
Kumar to Uthappa, $$FOUR$$ ,this straightens outside off, but Uthappa pushes forward very solidly and beats Irfan's dive at shortish mid on
Kumar to Uthappa,no run,on the front foot again to defend square on the off side
Kumar to Uthappa,no run,swings in from a length outside off, Uthappa pushes it nicely with the movement, finds midwicket
Kumar to Uthappa,no run,climbs as it moves in from outside off, Uthappa is forward to bring it down
Karn Sharma for some legspin
Kamal: "The umpiring in this IPL is so atrocious that even if you give one excellent decision, your name will be remembered for a decade!!!"
Sharma to Pandey,no run,leans forward to a tossed up ball and pushes it to mid off
Sharma to Pandey,no run,beaten as he comes out to this flighted ball, is hit on the leg
Sharma to Pandey,no run,some turn and bounce just outside off, pushed back to the bowler
Sharma to Pandey,1 run,tries to pull this 87 kph length delivery but mishits it to long on
Girish: "No surprise with the way Gambhir was furious and mouthing those bad words! Umpiring has been poor this season!"
Sharma to Uthappa,1 run,pitching around leg on a length and spinning across, Uthappa pulls but straight to deep midwicket
Sharma to Pandey,no run,leaves the crease again, but is nowhere near the pitch of the ball, it carries on straight and he defends
Sammy brings himself on
Sammy to Uthappa,no run,a length ball outside off is pushed back in the air, but it falls just short of the captain as he bends
Sammy to Uthappa,1 run,shortish, but he gets away as it is pulled to deep midwicket
Sammy to Pandey,no run,short of a length, pushed to cover
Sammy to Pandey, $$FOUR$$ ,short at 127 kph outside off, Pandey slaps it down the ground in the air, well clear of mid off
Sammy to Pandey,1 run,good length just outside off, he opens the face and steers it to third man
Sammy to Uthappa,1 run,takes it from around off and works it to mid on for a single

Sam: "Anyone else got the feeling that KKR are overly reliant on the top order and their middle order is shakier than a granny's knees? This may not work in the playoffs (if they get there, that is), Yusuf replacement required."

Steyn to Uthappa,2 runs,Dhawan's  $$dropped$$  it going back from cover, they brought Steyn bakc and Uthappa skied the length ball as he went half-heartedly after it, three men went after it from the infield, Dhawan was the nearest to the ball, he got both hands to it, but it popped out
Steyn to Uthappa, $$SIX$$ ,next ball after the drop goes for six, Steyn angles it into the pad, and Uthappa connects so well on the flick it goes well over the man at deep midwicket
Steyn to Uthappa,no run,147 kph length ball outside off, Uthappa swings and misses
Steyn to Uthappa,no run,Uthappe continues to attack Steyn, now he is beaten on the pull
Steyn to Uthappa,no run,Steyn is not liking this, he's shoved Uthappa away as he runs up the pitch to field the ball after Uthappa defends the short of a length ball and looks for a single
Steyn to Uthappa,1 run,a good length ball on off at 147 kph, Uthappa works it to the right of mid on
Mishra now as Sammy tries everything he has. Slip in

Mishra to Uthappa,no run,was that an edge, this slides in with the angle at 88 kph as Uthappa backs away and misses, it almost hits the middle stump, bounces just over in the end, keeper cannot collect
Mishra to Uthappa,no run,pushes a tossed up ball to the off side
Mishra to Uthappa, $$FOUR$$ ,goes on the back foot and slaps the length delivery over a jumping extra cover
Mishra to Uthappa,1 leg bye,wrong 'un brushes the pad and runs fine as Uthappa comes forward, didn't pick it
Mishra to Pandey,no run,waits as this googly turns in and he defends to point
Mishra to Pandey,1 run,length ball worked to deep midwicket
Sharma to Pandey,1 run,comes forward to a pitched up ball outside off and pushes to long off
Sharma to Uthappa,no run,he backs away to one on middle stump and cuts hard, but straight to backward point
Sharma to Uthappa,1 run,comes down the track and drives along the ground to long off
Sharma to Pandey,1 run,another single to long off as he pushes at a full one
Sharma to Uthappa, $$FOUR$$ ,slightly fuller this time, around middle, Uthappa makes some more room and launches it cleanly over extra cover
Sharma to Uthappa,2 runs,turned through midwicket for a couple
Irfan Pathan
Pathan to Pandey,1 run,goes after a full one slanted across him, but mishits it, gets the single to sweeper cover
Pathan to Uthappa,1 run,full delivery outside off, driven down to long off
Pathan to Pandey,1 run,comes down the track but can only force it past cover for one
Pathan to Uthappa, $$FOUR$$ ,Irfan goes short at 132 kph, Uthappa is a bit awkward on the pull as it climbs, but he clears midwicket easily
Pathan to Uthappa,1 run,hit to sweeper cover for a single
Pathan to Pandey,no run,pushes a length ball to Sammy at extra cover, he threatens to throw it at the non-striker's end, Uthappa has to turn around and hurry back
Time out
Mishra to Uthappa,1 run,full delivery on middle, worked to deep midwicket
Mishra to Pandey,1 run,forward to push a tossed up ball to deep point

Ozee: "Since dhawan is captain no more....he should be dropped.....rasool brought in....will strengthen the bowling and batting as well....dhawan has been miserable this ipl...and that would even allow warner to open the innings with finch."
Mishra to Uthappa, $$FOUR$$ ,excellently done, he's made room again outside leg, this is headed for the stumps from a good length, but he's reacted quickly to slap it high over extra cover
Mishra to Uthappa,no run,Mishra responds with a googly that spins in from outside off and beats Uthappa on the cut

Mishra to Uthappa, $$OUT$$ ,uh oh, Uthappa is walking even as keeper appeals for run out, he wanted the single after working it to short fine leg, had to turn back as the throw came in, Uthappa would have been in had the bat not slipped out from his hand, which is why he walked off immediately, he knew it
Mishra to Pathan,1 run,on the front foot to nudge a 91 kph delivery behind square leg
SRD: "Leave dhawan, i cant understand why they play rahul instead of rasool..? any idea..?"
Pathan to Pathan, $$FOUR$$ ,Yusuf gets going against brother with a sharp cut to the deep backward point rope, slight width from Irfan and that was enough for Yusuf
Pathan to Pathan,no run,a slower one on the stumps, Yusuf plays it back
Pathan to Pathan,no run,tries to cut but this is a slower one too, there is an appeal for caught behind, turned down, did not seem to be an edge
Pathan to Pathan,1 run,full delivery drilled down to long off
Pathan to Pandey,1 run,reaches for a wide one but drags it down to long off without any timing
Pathan to Pathan,no run,turned to square leg
Dhanush: "Guess that's one way to get Robin... He has been in terrific form... But both Robin and Gambhir seem to be run out candidates because of their edgy running..."
Mishra to Pandey,no run,flat and sliding down the pad, he tries to lift it behind square, misses
Mishra to Pandey, $$FOUR$$ ,full and down the pad once more, Pandey sweeps it calmly to the fine leg boundary
Mishra to Pandey, $$SIX$$ ,Pandey's hardly timed anything so far, but he's lofted this flighted legbreak over the extra cover boundary now
Mishra to Pandey,no run,googly hits the pad as Pandey pushes forward, sliding down
Mishra to Pandey, $$FOUR$$ ,flatter one headed down the pads, Pandey pulls it off the front foot between deep square leg and deep midwicket
Mishra to Pandey,1 run,turned to deep midwicket for a single
Asking rate below eight now
Kuldeep: "Will IP Address YP or will YP prevail as MP watches on from the non-striker's end??"
Steyn to Pandey,1 run,steers a 146 kph widish length ball to third man
Steyn to Pathan, $$FOUR$$ ,short of a length, widish, Yusuf cuts, Irfan it is who runs across from third man, he dives awkwardly, in vain, should have cut it off
Steyn to Pathan,no run,moves across and behind the line of a short of a good length ball to defend
Steyn to Pathan,1 run,back of a length ball steered to third man
Steyn to Pandey,no run,sharp bouncer at 148.5 kph, Pandey clears front leg and prepares to have a whack at it, it's too quick
Steyn to Pandey,1 run,a widish length ball even as Pandey makes some room outside leg, slaps it to sweeper cover in the end
Mridul Shandily: "SRH have been unlucky. One season in which they got a seam bowler like Bhuvi in the form of his life, their main spinner Mishra went off the radar!"
Sharma to Pandey,no run,skips out but Karn shortens the length, and he pushes it back
Sharma to Pandey,1 run,arches back and cuts to sweeper cover
Sharma to Pathan,1 run,worked off middle to deep midwicket, Warner sprints in and keeps them to one
Sharma to Pandey,1 run,tossed up and fuller, swatted to deep midwicket
Sharma to Pathan,no run,pitched up around middle, he is forward to block

Sharma to Pathan,1 run,stands outside leg before the ball is bowled, Karn bowls it just outside leg, Yusuf cannot find much power as he hits to Steyn's left at long off, fast bowler does not allow a second
Shiv: "When will SRH dugout realize that A Mishra is the culprit in their bowling attack.He was torn apart this season in almost every match."
Mishra to Pathan,1 run,slides on with the angle towards middle, is turned in front of square
Mishra to Pandey,1 run,gets too close to the pitch as he jumps out and forces it to long on
Mishra to Pathan, $$SIX$$ ,a full toss just outside off, Yusuf moves to off and hammers it over deep midwicket
Mishra to Pathan,no run,has another heave at a tossed up legbreak, it lands on the crease off an inside edge
Mishra to Pathan,1 run,hit hard down to long off

Mishra to Pandey,2 runs,Sammy's made it look more difficult than it was, almost pulled off a stunner before  $$dropping$$  it, Pandey swung and mishit over the captain at extra cover, Sammy went back, but not enough, he had to dive in the end, got both hands to it, but could not hold on as he landed
Sharma to Pathan,1 run,flat and quick down the pads, worked to deep square leg
Sharma to Pandey, $$OUT$$ ,Pandey departs, never really looked in touch, he slogged this full delivery straight to Finch at long on, he takes it it just over his head
RTD is in
Sharma to ten Doeschate,1 run,a low full toss is driven to long off
Sharma to Pathan,1 run,not too short, Yusuf pulls it wide of long on
Sharma to ten Doeschate,no run,comes forward to a 88 kph fullish delivery and pushes it back
Sharma to ten Doeschate,1 run,moves a leg to the on side to try and disturb the bowler, Karn is not, does not give him room with a pitched up ball on the stumps, RTD pushes it softly to long on
Madhur: "Why is mishra still playing... He is just leaking runs and not talking wickets, can try with different options like rasool or anyone else.."
Irfan and Sammy discuss their field placings. Square leg in the circle
Pathan to ten Doeschate,1 run,moves outside off stump and dabs a length delivery to third man
Ram: "Whenever you say RTD, I remember Residence time distribution in chemical engineering"
Pathan to Pathan,1 run,a full delivery outside off squeezed to third man
Pathan to ten Doeschate,1 run,he moves outside off stump again, Irfan follows him with a full one, only a single to long on
Pathan to Pathan,1 run,Irfan keeping it full outside off, Yusuf slogs but only drags it to deep midwicket
Pathan to ten Doeschate,1 run,a low full toss driven wide of the sweeper, there could have been a second, but Yusuf slipped while trying to turn
Pathan to Pathan,1 run,yet another full toss, quite wide too, Yusuf slams it straight to extra cover
Rajesh Dahari: "Whenever you say RTD, I remember Resistance temperature detector in instrumentation engineering........."
Kumar to Pathan, $$SIX$$ ,Yusuf gets maximum off the first ball of the over, it is a full toss, and he mows it over deep midwicket
Kumar to Pathan,1 run,another full toss, Yusuf swipes, it flies down to long off along the ground
Vishwas: "Stage set for KKR to snatch defeat from Jaws of Victory"
Kumar to ten Doeschate, $$FOUR$$ ,full and wide, RTD square drives in the air and picks up four to the deep backward point boundary, one bounce and over the rope
Kumar to ten Doeschate,1 run,full on the pads, worked to Irfan at square leg
Kumar to Pathan,1 run,full and wide goes Bhuvneshwar, Yusuf has a heave, thick edge races to third man
Kumar to ten Doeschate,1 run,one more full toss, around off, forced to long on
AHMAD OMAR: "OMG!!! whats going on!!!! YP is playing a match winning innings..... Am I watching cricinfo commentary in my dreams or what ? Somebody pinch me please....."
Dale Steyn
Steyn to ten Doeschate,1 run,opens the face on a length ball and takes the single to third man
Steyn to Pathan,2 runs,Yusuf moves across and swings hard at a full delivery, slices it over point, comes back for the second, has to dive in, makes it
Kamal: "Someone please hide the Panic button from KKR!!!"
Steyn to Pathan,1 run,Yusuf walks across once more, he wants to work a full delivery to leg, but it swings away very late, and the leading edge goes over point
Steyn to ten Doeschate,no run,nearly 150 kph length ball from Steyn, RTD has a swing and miss outside off
Steyn to ten Doeschate,1 run,moves outside off and turns the full toss to deep midwicket
Steyn to Pathan,1 run,shuffles across, opens up but can only get a single to deep midwicket as Steyn is very full on the stumps again
Top over from Steyn
Kumar to Pathan,1 run,low full toss turned in the gap wide of deep midwicket but Warner races across to keep them to one

Kumar to ten Doeschate, $$SIX$$ ,Tendo does it, he makes room outside leg, Bhuvneshwar goes full on middle and off, Tendo launches it flat over extra cover, and it is timed so well it goes just over the rope
Kumar to ten Doeschate,2 runs,a yorker, he's squeezed it off the stumps to backward point, the throw misses at the non-striker's and they taken one more
Kumar to ten Doeschate, $$FOUR$$ ,Yusuf lets out a long, never-ending scream as RTD flays a full delivery straight down the ground to finish the job for KKR
That is all for tonight. Good bye

$$Umesh$$ $$Yadav$$ $$is$$ $$the$$ $$Man$$ $$of$$ $$the$$ $$Match$$ $$for$$ $$his$$ $$3$$ $$for$$ $$26$$ . Yadav: "I am very happy with my bowling and that we have won. I stuck to my plan, I have been working hard, my rhythm came back. I have been working on my basics. It was a good wicket, there was bounce, swing, I was enjoying bowling on it."

$$Gautam$$ $$Gambhir$$ : "I would not have reacted that way had I nicked it. Just happened in the heat of the moment. It was a big game for us. Happy with the way the rest of the guys batted. Want to give credit to the bowlers on such a wicket. Looking at the wicket, playing three spinners, we were looking at chasing 160-odd. The three spinners bowled brilliantly to restrict them."

$$Darren$$ $$Sammy$$ : "The dot balls at the end (of our innings) cost us. The bowlers fought back to make a game out of it. We know that catches win matches, we dropped two crucial ones today. Different conditions from last year (in Hyderabad) but we have had some good games. We have not capitalised on key moments. It is not over, we have to win all three and hope some results go in our favour."
Players shake hands and Yusuf gets a long, warm embrace from Irfan. Wasn't as easy a chase in the end as it seemed to be at the innings break but Yusuf and Ryan ten Doeschate stepped up at the death

name: Sunrisers Hyderabad v Kolkata Knight Riders
